name: Edward L. WRIGHT, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Wright v. Commonwealth, Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Edward L. WRIGHT, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of December, 2015, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Alan Matthew Robinson, Kara W. Haggerty, Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole.
casebody.head_matter:
129 A.3d 513
Edward L. WRIGHT, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 21, 2015.
Edward L. Wright, Pro Se.
Alan Matthew Robinson, Kara W. Haggerty, Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole.
